description: This is the object type for the queryCriteria parameter of retrieve object functions.

filter.description: This filters the objects that will be returned. If not specified, all objects will be returned.
filter.label: Filter

select.description: This is a list of the names of properties to include in result. If not specified, all properties are returned.
select.label: Include Properties

sort.description: This is a list of then names of properties used to sort the returned objects in highest to lowest order. Optionally, the property name can be prefixed with a minus sign ('-') to indicate descending order. FIXME '-' is probably not a good idea.
sort.label: Sort Order

urlEncodedRQLString.description: This is a URL encoded RQL string. This parameter is mutually exclusive with all other properties.
urlEncodedRQLString.label: URL RQL String
